parameter.name: full_output
parameter.description: When set to false only the prediction, upper and lower bounds are returned. If set to true additional information is returned.

parameter.name: index_attribute
parameter.description: Attribute of training example set used as index / timestamp variable.

parameter.name: forecast_attribute
parameter.description: Attribute of training example set used as forecast variable.

parameter.name: n_changepoints
parameter.description: Number of potential changepoints to include.

parameter.name: seasonality_prior_scale
parameter.description: Parameter modulating the strength of the seasonality model. Larger values allow the model to fit larger seasonal fluctuations, smaller values dampen the seasonality. Can be specified for individual seasonalities using add_seasonality.

parameter.name: changepoint_prior_scale
parameter.description: Parameter modulating the flexibility of the automatic changepoint selection. Large values will allow many changepoints, small values will allow few changepoints.

parameter.name: holidays_prior_scale
parameter.description: Parameter modulating the strength of the holiday components model, unless overridden in the holidays input.
